title: Rename frontend branding from PDF Toolkit to PDF Vaulty

requirements.summary: Update all user-visible frontend branding from “PDF Toolkit” to “PDF Vaulty” (document title, header brand text, logo alt text, and hero copy).
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation/header brand displays “PDF Vaulty” and the logo image alt text is “PDF Vaulty”.
Homepage hero heading no longer contains “PDF Toolkit” and instead shows “PDF Vaulty”.
No remaining user-facing English strings display “PDF Toolkit” in the UI.

file_operations.description: Update the static HTML document <title> from “PDF Toolkit” to “PDF Vaulty” so the browser tab/title reflects the new branding.
Update the header brand text and the logo image alt text from “PDF Toolkit” to “PDF Vaulty” while keeping existing navigation structure intact.
Update the non-UI appIdentifier fallback value from “pdf-toolkit” to “pdf-vaulty” to align ancillary branding/tracking identifiers with the new app name.

requirements.summary: Update English i18n strings containing “PDF Toolkit” to “PDF Vaulty” without changing translation keys.
acceptanceCriteria: In the English locale, i18n-provided strings that previously rendered “PDF Toolkit” now render “PDF Vaulty” (e.g., the Home hero highlighted word).
No broken/missing translation keys are introduced (no undefined/blank text where translations are used).

file_operations.description: Replace English translation values that reference “PDF Toolkit” with “PDF Vaulty” (e.g., home hero highlight and any other occurrences), preserving the existing translation key structure and leaving keys unchanged.
